metadata.title: CVE-2019-20387 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: repodata_schema2id in repodata.c in libsolv before 0.7.6 has a heap-basedbuffer over-read via a last schema whose length is less than the length ofthe input schema.

criterions.comment: libsolv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
